about.title: About GoalGazer
paragraphs: GoalGazer is a cutting-edge football analytics platform designed to bridge the gap between raw match data and meaningful tactical narratives. We utilize advanced automated pipelines to process thousands of match events into structured, readable insights that were previously only available to professional analysts.

Our mission is to democratize tactical football intelligence. By combining high-fidelity event data with original visualizations, we provide a transparent, evidence-backed alternative to traditional speculative match reporting. Every visualization on this platform is generated in-house to ensure consistency and factual accuracy.

Transparency is at the core of GoalGazer. We believe football analysis should be as scientific as it is passionate. By exposing data limitations and citing our primary sources, we empower readers to understand not just what happened on the pitch, but why it happened through the lens of objective data.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: For editorial questions, data corrections, or partnership requests, contact us at
contact.outro: We do not accept sponsorships or content placements that require altering data-driven conclusions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
paragraphs: GoalGazer does not collect personally identifiable information. We use basic analytics to understand page performance and to improve editorial coverage.
If analytics are enabled, they are aggregated and do not include marketing identifiers. We do not sell user data or share it with third parties for advertising.

dataProvenances.label: Data Provenance
dataProvenances.summary: This match analysis was generated by the GoalGazer automated pipeline, combining data from Opta, Understat, and Football-Data.org. Human editors reviewed the core tactical assessments for accuracy.

sources.title: Data Transparency & Sources
sources.intro: GoalGazer maintains a commitment to data integrity by sourcing match statistics from globally recognized, licensed providers. Our primary data feed is powered by API-FOOTBALL, ensuring accuracy across top-tier leagues.
list: Core Match Data: Fixtures, official lineups, and timestamped match events provided by API-FOOTBALL.
Derived Metrics: Performance impact coefficients and tactical efficiency ratings computed locally using proprietary analytical models.
Original Visuals: All shot maps, formation pitches, and tactical charts are generated using open-source scientific libraries like Matplotlib and mplsoccer, ensuring 100% original content.
sources.outro: We acknowledge that no data feed is perfect. Any match-specific data limitations or missing event fields are explicitly flagged within individual articles to maintain full transparency with our readers.

editorialPolicy.title: Editorial Integrity & AI Policy
paragraphs: GoalGazer operates on a 'Data-First' editorial principle. Every tactical assertion made in our reviews must be independently verifiable through the accompanying match data. We strictly prohibit speculative narratives, fan bias, or sensationalist claims that are not backed by statistical evidence.

AI Disclosure: Our analysis is synthesized using advanced automated models to ensure speed and depth. However, our technical team maintains oversight of the analytical frameworks to ensure that the logic remains grounded in tactical reality. We disclose the automated nature of our content to maintain trust with our audience.

Visual Standards: We respect intellectual property. GoalGazer does not use copyrighted club crests, player photographs, or broadcaster footage. Instead, we invest in creating high-quality, neutral schematic diagrams that focus purely on tactical positioning and ball movement.
Ethical Conduct: We maintain complete independence. We do not accept sponsorships from gambling entities and avoid any language that could be interpreted as financial or betting advice.

terms.title: Terms of Service

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
paragraphs: By accessing and using GoalGazer ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to these Terms of Service, please do not use the Service.

sections.title: 2. Use License
paragraphs: Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials (information or software) on GoalGazer for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
bullets: Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
Attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on GoalGazer
Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
Transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server

sections.title: 3. Content Ownership
paragraphs: All content published on GoalGazer, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of GoalGazer or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws.
Match data and statistics are sourced from licensed third-party providers. All visualizations and tactical analysis are original content created by GoalGazer.

sections.title: 4. Disclaimer
paragraphs: The materials on GoalGazer are provided on an 'as is' basis. GoalGazer makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

GoalGazer does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.

sections.title: 5. Limitations
paragraphs: In no event shall GoalGazer or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on GoalGazer, even if GoalGazer or a GoalGazer authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

sections.title: 6. Accuracy of Materials
paragraphs: The materials appearing on GoalGazer could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. GoalGazer does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current. GoalGazer may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice.

sections.title: 7. Links
paragraphs: GoalGazer has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by GoalGazer of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.

sections.title: 8. Modifications
paragraphs: GoalGazer may revise these Terms of Service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these Terms of Service.

sections.title: 9. Governing Law
paragraphs: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.

sections.title: 10. Contact Information
paragraphs: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

Daily.production_notice: Automated tactical interpretation of the day's high-stakes football drama.
Daily.ticker_notice: Market values are currently reflecting the tactical dominance seen in the high-press efficiency charts.
Daily.about_desc: Each Tactical Gazette edition is synthesized using real-time match data and deep-learning tactical interpretation. Values are calculated based on performance impact coefficients.
